name: Hell Slayer (itch)
description:
The forces of hell have escaped, and it's your job to beat them into submission. You play as a knight slaughtering monsters from hell.

How To Play

Kill monsters and collect XP to upgrade your abilities. Enemies come in increasingly difficult waves. Survive for 5 minutes to win.

There are 2 levels: Meadow and Hell. Hell is more difficult, but it may not be balanced well.

Controls

WASD to move.
Abilities fire automatically.

Abilities

Abilities deal damage to enemies. The higher the level, the more powerful they are.

Upgrades

Upgrades improve your abilities. They can do things like increase the damage, reduce cooldowns and make your abilities fire more projectiles at once.

Augments

Augments change the nature of your abilities. They can improve them slightly, or completely change the way they work.

Each ability can only have one augment at a time.
